mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_enrollment e INNER JOIN tb_course_time t1 ON t1.course_no = e.course_no AND e.enrollment_status = 0 INNER JOIN tb_course_time t2 ON t2.course_no = #{courseNo} WHERE e.student_user_no = #{studentUserNo} AND t1.course_time_yoil = t2.course_time_yoil AND ( t1.course_time_start BETWEEN t2.course_time_start AND t2.course_time_end OR t1.course_time_end BETWEEN t2.course_time_start AND t2.course_time_end OR t2.course_time_start BETWEEN t1.course_time_start AND t1.course_time_end )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_enrollment (student_user_no, course_no, enrollment_status, createdate) VALUES (#{studentUserNo}, #{courseNo}, #{enrollmentStatus}, NOW())
mapper.select:
SELECT e.enrollment_no AS enrollmentNo , e.enrollment_status AS enrollmentStatus , e.createdate
, c.course_no AS courseNo , c.course_name AS courseName , c.course_score AS courseScore , c.course_capacity AS courseCapacity
, u.user_name AS professorName
, t.course_time_yoil AS courseTimeYoil , t.course_time_start AS courseTimeStart , t.course_time_end AS courseTimeEnd
FROM tb_enrollment e INNER JOIN tb_course c ON c.course_no = e.course_no INNER JOIN tb_sysuser u ON u.user_no = c.professor_user_no INNER JOIN tb_course_time t ON t.course_no = c.course_no
WHERE e.student_user_no = #{studentUserNo} AND e.enrollment_status = 0
ORDER BY e.enrollment_no DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_enrollment WHERE student_user_no = #{studentUserNo} AND enrollment_status = 0
